Container.Name: bytestash
Container.Overview: ByteStash is a web-based application for managing and organising code snippets with a clean, modern interface. Features include syntax highlighting, categorisation, a full-fledged code editor.

Config.Name: SNIPPET_DIRECTORY
Config.Description: Directory where code snippets will be stored

Config.Name: BASE_PATH
Config.Description: Which base path should be used? E.g. /bytestash links to http://[IP]:[PORT]/bytestash/. Always start with a forward slash. Leave empty if not required.

Config.Name: JWT_SECRET
Config.Description: Used for authentication, generate your own secure JWT secret and put it here

Config.Name: TOKEN_EXPIRY
Config.Description: How long the token lasts, examples: 24h, 7d, 2w

Config.Name: OIDC_DISPLAY_NAME
Config.Description: The OIDC provider name, e.g. Authelia, Authentik

Config.Name: OIDC_ISSUER_URL
Config.Description: The auth URL of your SSO server, e.g. auth.website.com/application/o/bytestash

Config.Name: OIDC_CLIENT_SECRET
Config.Description: The client secret you used to generate the hmac secret

Config.Name: ALLOW_NEW_ACCOUNTS
Config.Description: Enable / disable the creation of new accounts
